Love Heart Mittens (for Male)
kDesc
Your heart in their hands. Well, on their wrists. [#Legal]
Votre cœur dans leurs mains. Enfin, sur leurs poignets. [#Legal]
Dein Herz in ihrer Hand. Oder zumindest an ihren Handgelenken. [#Legal]
Il tuo cuore nelle loro mani. Beh, sui loro polsi. [#Legal]
Tu corazón en sus manos. Bueno, en sus muñecas. [#Legal]
あの人たちの手（手首）の中にあなたの愛が… [#Legal]
당신의 하트를 그들의 손, 아니 손목 위에 올려 주세요. [#Legal]
Your heart in their hands. Well, on their wrists. [#Legal]
讓他們用手捧著你的心。好吧，其實是手腕。 [#Legal]
讓他們用手捧著你的心。好吧，其實是手腕。 [#Legal]
Your heart in their hands. Well, on their wrists. [#Legal]
